Welcome to the Rich Bastard application!
 In this game your goal is to answer correctly as many questions as possible.
 There are three game modes: Classic game, which resembles a popular TV show, Thematical game, where the questions are from a particular topic, and a Blitz round, where you have limited time to think, so you'd better be quick!
 
 Each question has 4 answer choices, only one of which is correct. You may also use one of each three hints:
 * 50x50 - removes two wrong answer choices.
 * Ask the audience - the real-life simulation of a audience responses, with normal distribution.
 * Change the question - if you find the question too challenging, you may use this hint to change it to a another one. But be vary! If you have used previous hints on this question, the new question won't have the results of these hints.
 
 Good luck, and become rich, bastard! =)
